results.title: Australia's new north-west. Pt. 2: The Pilbara-Hamersley region
results.brief_description: This program deals with the pastoral and timber industries in the Pilbara area, the development of iron ore mining at Mount Tom Price and the growth of towns and industries as a result. Narrated by Roger Climpson.

results.title: Australia's New North-West. Pt. 1: The Kimberley
results.brief_description: Part one of a two-part series, this film deals with agricultural and pastoral development in the Kimberley region. It illustrates the results of irrigation on pilot areas and also refers to the Flying Doctor Service, the School of the Air, and stock, crop and pasture improvement. Narrated by Roger Climpson.

results.title: Australia
results.creator_credit: Arch Nicholson, Richard Mason, Film Australia and Tourism Australia

results.title: Australasian Landforms (Captioned)
results.brief_description: This documentary shows the evolution of Australia, New Guinea and New Zealand over the last 2,000 million years ago. Animation is combined with aerial footage of the four main landform regions: The Western Shield, Central Basin, Eastern Highlands and the Island Arc from New Guinea to New Zealand.
results.description: This documentary shows the evolution of Australia, New Guinea and New Zealand over the last 2,000 million years ago. results.title: Australasian landforms
results.creator_credit: Ken J. Widdowson and Educational Media
results.brief_description: Shows the effects of continental drift on the evolution of Australasia. Animation and aerial footage is used to show the features of the four major landform regions which make up present-day Australasia - The Western Shield, the Central Basins, the Eastern Highland and the Island Arc from New Guinea to New Zealand.
